keywords.value: Let Us Now Praise Susan Sontag (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: The inaugural production by Ms. Kempson’s company, 7 Daughters of Eve Thtr. & Perf. Co., is a consideration of how stories are told and who gets to tell them.

headline.print_headline: The Ethics of Telling Someone Else’s Story
headline.main: Review: ‘Let Us Now Praise Susan Sontag,’ by Sibyl Kempson

snippet: The inaugural production by Ms. Kempson’s company, 7 Daughters of Eve Thtr. & Perf. Co., is a consideration of how stories are told and who gets to tell them.
abstract: Alexis Soloski reviews 7 Daughters of Eve Thtr & Perf Co production of play Let Us Now Praise Susan Sontag, written and directed by Sibyl Kempson, at Abrons Art Center.
